1.name: Freddy vs. Jason
1.description: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

2.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
2.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

3.name: Hulk
3.description: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

4.name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
4.description: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.

5.name: The Dreamers
5.description: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.

6.name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
6.description: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding loon and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

7.name: Love Actually
7.description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

8.name: The Room
8.description: Johnny is a successful banker who lives happily in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, inexplicably, she gets bored with him and decides to seduce his best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

9.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
9.description: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

10.name: Lost in Translation
10.description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

11.name: Oldeuboi
11.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

12.name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
12.description: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

13.name: Monster
13.description: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

14.name: Big Fish
14.description: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

15.name: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
15.description: A cybernetic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 25-year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

16.name: The Matrix Reloaded
16.description: Following the events of The Matrix (1999), Neo and the rebel leaders estimate they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

17.name: Mystic River
17.description: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

18.name: Finding Nemo
18.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

19.name: School of Rock
19.description: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn them into a rock band.

20.name: Underworld
20.description: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

21.name: Holes
21.description: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

22.name: Old School
22.description: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.

23.name: The Last Samurai
23.description: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

24.name: X2: X-Men United
24.description: When anti-mutant Colonel William Stryker kidnaps Professor X and attacks his school, the X-Men must ally with their archenemy Magneto to stop him.

25.name: Dogville
25.description: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado town. In exchange, she agrees to work for them. As a search visits the town, she finds out that their support has a price. Yet her dangerous secret is never far away.

26.name: Open Range
26.description: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

27.name: The Matrix Revolutions
27.description: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

28.name: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
28.description: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, science fiction, and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

29.name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
29.description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

30.name: House of 1000 Corpses
30.description: Two young couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

31.name: Identity
31.description: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

32.name: Cheaper by the Dozen
32.description: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

33.name: Wrong Turn
33.description: Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by "cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding."

34.name: Peter Pan
34.description: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

35.name: Daredevil
35.description: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

36.name: Thirteen
36.description: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.

37.name: The Core
37.description: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

38.name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
38.description: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

39.name: Bad Boys II
39.description: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

40.name: The Italian Job
40.description: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.

41.name: Shanghai Knights
41.description: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

42.name: Memories of Murder
42.description: In a small Korean province in 1986, three detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

43.name: Daddy Day Care
43.description: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

44.name: Dreamcatcher
44.description: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space.

45.name: Bruce Almighty
45.description: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

46.name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
46.description: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

47.name: Cold Mountain
47.description: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

48.name: 21 Grams
48.description: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

49.name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
49.description: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

50.name: Johnny English
50.description: After a sudden attack on the MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.
